title: Bringing the Supermarket to the Apocalypse - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Horror   Martial Arts   Sci-fi
tags: Alternate World   Bloodlines   Calm Protagonist   Cheats   Clever Protagonist   Cultivation   Domestic Affairs   Evolution   Fast Cultivation   Firearms   Game Elements   Hard-Working Protagonist   Leadership   Magic   Magical Space   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Mutated Creatures   Post-apocalyptic   Special Abilities   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Sudden Strength Gain   Survival   Transported Modern Structure   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong   Zombies
author: San she tang   三舍堂
description: Lin Feng was originally in charge of Supermarket supply.  One day the supermarket accidentally enters an Apocalypse world.  The apocalypse is happening, he has a supermarket in his hand.  See how Lin Feng brings a supermarket to survive the Apocalypse.>
